page.title: 09EDUCATION 3
page.content: HIGH SCHOOL. Children from the age of 11 to 16 are taken by bus to Hartismere High School at Eye leaving home at 8.10 a.m. Assembly is followed by classes in the following subjects - French, German, English, Mathematics, Art, Geography, History, Science, Office Practice, Metalwork, Woodwork, Mechanics, Drama, Music, Computer Studies, Cookery, Home Economics, Religious Studies, Needlework, Child Care, Technical Drawing. Sporting Activities include - Football, Rugby, Cricket, Rounders, Tennis, Badminton, Swimming, Hockey, Netball, Basketball, Athletics, Gymnastics.
